segments.script: "Attention all my dears out there, this is Mr. New Vegas with an emergency broadcast. A massive dust wall of extreme radiation is bearing down on us! Visibility will be zero and the air is hazardous even through filters. Seek shelter immediately in concrete structures or underground - the Strip casinos have reinforced levels, while Lucky 38, Vault entrances, and sewers provide protection from these deadly radioactive particulates. Stay safe my loves until this passes in approximately 6 hours."

segments.script: "Good morning, darlings! It's your man Mr. New Vegas here, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed for another fantastic day in this wild wasteland we call home. The clock strikes nine o'clock sharp - time to shake off that night's slumber, grab a cup of joe, and get ready to take on the Mojave sun! Remember, quote/unquote: 'The women of New Vegas ask me a lot if there's a Mrs. New Vegas. Well, of course there is. You're her.' Now let's make today unforgettable, shall we?"

segments.script:
This is Mr. New Vegas, and I feel something magic in the air tonight. Let's dig into some juicy gossip, shall we, Mrs. New Vegas? I heard whispers that Caesar's Legion was planning a big strike against the NCR right here at Mojave Outpost, but our brave Rangers caught wind of it first and stopped 'em cold! Someone told me there were even deserters from the Legion who fled back to Arizona after they saw how outnumbered and outgunned they'd be. Word is, those renegades might just start a rebellion against Caesar himself.

Now, I don't want you to go thinking this means all's well in our little corner of the Mojave, but it sure does give us hope that freedom can prevail even in these dark times. Remember, Mrs. New Vegas, till somebody loves you, you're nobody at all. And out here in the wasteland, we've got love - for each other, for our way of life, and for the brave men and women fighting to protect it all. So keep on listening, darlin', as I spin more tales of adventure and romance under the neon lights of New Vegas City!
